migrations.description: Split global configuration files into individual project.json files. This migration has been added automatically to the beginning of your migration set to retroactively make them work with the new version of Nx.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper in encapsulated repos.
migrations.name: 15.8.2-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Add node_modules to root eslint ignore
migrations.name: add-eslint-ignore

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v12. Cypress 12 contains a handful of breaking changes that might causes tests to start failing that nx cannot directly fix. Read more Cypress 12 changes: https://docs.cypress.io/guides/references/migration-guide#Migrating-to-Cypress-12-0.This migration will only run if you are already using Cypress v11.
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-12

migrations.description: Update jest configs to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-configs-jest-29

migrations.description: Update jest test files to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-tests-jest-29

migrations.description: Split global configuration files (e.g., workspace.json) into individual project.json files.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Remove browserslist config as it's handled by build-angular
migrations.name: remove-browserlist-config

migrations.description: Remove exported `@angular/platform-server` `renderModule` method. The `renderModule` method is now exported by the Angular CLI.
migrations.name: update-platform-server-exports

migrations.description: Remove no longer needed require calls in Karma builder main file.
migrations.name: update-karma-main-file

migrations.description: Install the required angular-devkit packages as we do not directly depend on them anymore
migrations.name: install-required-packages

migrations.description: Update `@nrwl/web/babel` preset to `@nrwl/js/babel` for projects that have a .babelrc file.
migrations.name: update-babel-preset

migrations.description: Since Angular v15, the `RouterLink` contains the logic of the `RouterLinkWithHref` directive. This migration replaces all `RouterLinkWithHref` references with `RouterLink`.
migrations.name: migration-v15-router-link-with-href

migrations.description: In Angular version 15, the deprecated `relativeLinkResolution` config parameter of the Router is removed. This migration removes all `relativeLinkResolution` fields from the Router config objects.
migrations.name: migration-v15-relative-link-resolution
